title: The roles of sialic acid in the commensal and disease states of Haemophilus influenzae
abstractText: The Department of Paediatrics, the Weatherall Institute of Molecular Medicine and the University of Oxford are committed to the teaching and training of health professionals and the excellence of these research activities is a critical component of providing the expertise and the credibility to undertake this function. In addition to the Medical School, Public Seminars, Formal and Workshop-style talks to schools, interactions with the media are an integral part of the applicants activities, supported by the entire reseach group -- as for example in our joint participatiion in the Royal Society s Summer Exhibition this June (2004). Our research contributions are publicly available through peer-reviewed, publications and we offer access to our research and teaching activities through Departmental and Institutional Web sites.
